## Serializer.serialize() method

Serialize the given object into a string.

**Signature:**

```typescript
serialize(object: any): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  object | any | The object to serialize. |

**Returns:**
